summary: SEC Chairman Gary Gensler wants more authority before Congress works out how best to regulate the cryptocurrencies.
title: US Treasury to Say SEC Can Regulate Stablecoins: Report
content: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) may have moved one step closer to achieving significant oversight on stablecoins.
Read more: Gary Gensler Says Crypto Is a ‘Wild West.’ Others See Pure Capitalism
